name: What is Homie to you?
description:
YO DOG, I HEARD YOU LIKE FIGHTING GAMES, I ALSO HEARD YOU HAVE SWEET EYES, A KILLER SMILE AND THE KIND OF POSITIVE ENERGY THAT MOVES MOUNTAINS! 

NO INSTRUCTIONS, JUST GO COMPLIMENT YOUR HOMIE


Made for the Global Game Jam 2019 in 2 days.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LiamSorta / https://twitter.com/Bjellen1
